name: The Game is a Liar (Chronicle Games)
name_original: The Game is a Liar (Chronicle Games)
description:
This game was made in less than 4 days for the CCC Jam 2.0 with the theme: Mission Failed Successfully

The creator of this game is a liar. Figure out how to fail the task to complete the puzzle and move on to the next level. 

This proof of concept includes 5 beginner levels (possibly more to come in future updates)

List of Pre-Made Assets can be found here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1RGWXb93ApOjan1pQyGo5Avf4CkK0xxmBQzJ5xT2dmtk/...
